overview: Travel up up and away with the bravest bears around as they encounter big problems in the sky. Watch our much-loved companions as they face troublesome villains and Mother Nature in pursuit of happiness and fun.  Episodes:  1. The Night the Stars Went Out - Maestro Strato - Nefarious' violin playing causes the stars to collect in his pickle jar and torrential rains to fall.  2. Dry Spell - Share Bear helps Joey and Elaine who are upset because of a dry spell in their town.  3. The Cloud Worm - A cloud quake alerts the Care Bears to an invasion of Care-a-Lot.
title: Care Bears: Starry Skies
